article_title: Hostage Sahar Baruch killed during rescue attempt, IDF confirms.
sentence: Hostage  Sahar  Baruch  killed  during  rescue  attempt,  IDF  confirms.

article_title: Hostage Sahar Baruch killed during rescue attempt, IDF confirms.
sentence: Hostage  Sahar  Baruch,  taken  by  Hamas  from  Israel  during  the  7  October  attacks,  was  killed  during  a  rescue  attempt  on  8  December  by  Israeli  forces,  the  military  has  confirmed.

article_title: Hostage Sahar Baruch killed during rescue attempt, IDF confirms.
sentence: In  a  statement,  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  says:  "At  this  point,  it  is  not  possible  to  determine  the  circumstances  of  Sahar's  death,  and  it  is  not  known  whether  he  was  murdered  by  Hamas  or  killed  by  our  forces'  fire.  "

article_title: Hostage Sahar Baruch killed during rescue attempt, IDF confirms.
sentence: It  was  confirmed  last  month  that  Baruch,  25,  had  been  killed  while  being  held  captive  in  Gaza.
